pageProduct.name: A Little Bit Of Relief 100g Tube
pageProduct.description:
General Information

A Little Bit of Relief is a cooling, pain relief gel formulated with natural active ingredients for the temporary relief of arthritic pain, rheumatic pain, muscular aches, backache, cramps, muscular spasms, sciatica & sport injuries.

A Little Bit of Relief uses natural active ingredients including eucalyptus and peppermint oils. These ingredients have analgesic and anti-inflammatory properties to temporarily ease pain and reduce swelling, without the unwanted side effects that are associated with other medications.

A Little Bit of Relief is  :

An Easy to apply gel, for pain relief as you need it.

Formulated to be suitable for long term use, such as for the management of chronic pain.

Warnings

If symptoms persist seek the advice of a healthcare practitioner. Not recommended for use on infants or young children. Always read the label. Follow the directions for use. Avoid contact with eyes., face and open wounds.

Ingredients

Peppermint and Eucalptus oils which hold anti-inflammatory properties.

Directions

Apply liberally to the affected area. Use three to Four times Daily. Rub in a circular motion untill absorbed, Re-apply as often as needed.
